name: 黃如瑩
objective:
本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：
1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。
2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。
3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。
4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
schedule:
Advanced English for Graduate Students進階應用英文
Instructor: Prof. Ju-ying Vinia Huang 黃如瑩 老師
Schedule:
Class a: Thursday 10:10~12:00noon
Class b: Friday 10:10~12:00noon
I. Objectives課程目標:  The aim of this course is to help students
(1) build up a personal dossier containing important documents needed for future career development, including autobiography, resume, and application letters, 個人英文檔案
(2) sharpen up communication skills in listening, conversation, and short speeches, 溝通與表達能力
(3) open up global vision through the reading of articles on important international issues, such as technological innovation, weather changes, and cross-cultural understanding in English magazines. 國際事務的了解
II. Required texts 教材:
(1)	English magazine “Studio Classroom” (October Issue)空中英語教室十月號
(2)	A reader composed of lyrics of songs, short dialogues, short plays, jokes and important sentences to memorize. 老師彙編的補充英文讀本,含歌詞,對話,短劇,值得背誦的笑話及經典佳句.
III. Percentile distribution of final grades評分標準:
(1)	Weekly test on the reading of the week每週閱讀文章的小考:
4% X 15 = 60% (Students with four un-excused absences will get a “Failure” for this course.無故四次缺席,本學期總成績一律不予及格!)
(2)	Monthly exams (including listening comprehension, grammar, vocabulary, sentence making and translation) 月考, 項目包括聽力,文法,字彙,造句,翻譯.
10% X 3 = 30%
(3)	Individual presentation in English個人上臺秀英文: 10% X 1 = 10%
IV. Syllabus:
Week 1 Fall semester begins.
Week 2 Introduction
Part One:
Week 3 Reading 1 (Studio English Classroom空中英語教室)and English songs (Reader補充讀本)
Week 4 Reading 2 and short English dialogues
Week 5 Reading 3 and English short plays
Week 6 Reading 4 and English speeches
Week 7 (1 )Monthly exam 1 of 3月考 , (2) autobiography due交英文自傳
Part Two:
Week 8 Reading 5 and English songs
Week 9 Reading 6 and short English dialogues
Week 10 Reading 7, and English short plays
Week 11 Reading 8, and English speeches
Week 12 (1)Monthly exam 2 of 3月考, (2) resume due交英文履歷表
Part Three
Week 13 Reading 13 and English songs
Week 14 Reading 14 and short English dialogues
Week 15 Reading 15 and English short plays
Week 16 Reading 16 and English speeches
Week 17 (1)Monthly exam 3 of 3,月考, (2) application letter due交英文申請書信
Week 18 Final exam:  Individual presentation 個人英語口語呈現
